body.name: Double Din Car Stereo, Apple Carplay, 7‘’ 1024 * 600 Touch Screen, GPS Navigation, Bluetooth Car Radio, Mirror Link, Night Vision Backup Camera, BT Hand-Free Calling, FM Radio, USB/TF
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 40 mins
features: 1. Apple carplay&carplay navigation: Car stereo built-in Apple car play and Android auto system, easy to connect via data cable, use the voice control function to access your phone functions, drivers can answer calls, play music, GPS navigation, voice mail, etc. without taking their hands off the steering wheel.

2. Car Bluetooth 5.1:Bluetooth in cars lets drivers use their phones without having to physically connect them to the car's audio system, enabling hands-free calling and audio streaming while driving.

3. HD touch screen: The high-definition 1024*600 capacitive touch screen of a car radio allows for easy and precise navigation of the radio's interface, making it simple to control media playback, access navigation tools, and adjust settings while driving.

4. Rear View Camera: The car radio has a backup camera that displays the reverse image when the car is in reverse gear, and includes a high-definition rear camera with 12 LED lights, night vision, a 170° ultra-wide viewing angle, and a waterproof design.

5. Multifunctional Double Din Car radio: Supports Bluetooth 5.1, dual USB, TF card, AUX,10 band EQ setting, remote control, and steering wheel control.FM car radio presets 18 stations (frequency: 87.5-108 MHz), you can listen to TV broadcasts, news, weather forecast, and travel information at any time, and enjoy your driving time.

6. Mirror Link&2 USB Ports: Double din car stereo supports the mirror link function of Apple and Android mobile phones.Use the USB connection to synchronize your smartphone to the big screen. For example, when the navigation function is turned on on the mobile phone, the navigation route will be displayed synchronously on the car audio.A USB has a 2A fast charging function, so you don't have to worry about running out of your phone's battery.

7. Installation and service: The size of this 7-inch car radio is 7*2.36*3.98 inches. This car radio is a universal double din standard, please confirm whether your car matches this size before ordering. The package is equipped with product installation instructions, please feel free to contact us 24H online customer service if you have any problems with the installation connection, we will provide you with 1-year warranty and lifelong technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 7 Inch Double Din Car Stereo with Carplay&Android Auto Supports Apple Carplay and Android Auto, provides excellent voice-assisted control, makes calls, navigates, and plays music with the help of smart voice assistants, ensuring completely safe driving!Support the mirror connection function of apple and Android, and sync your smartphone to the big screen via USB data cable. You can easily enjoy all functions such as maps, movies, etc. Through the mirror link, you can watch videos anytime and anywhere, so that you and your family and friends will not feel bored when drivingThe new Bluetooth 5.1 system provides a stable connection with your smartphone through Bluetooth wireless audio streaming, and you can play music through your smartphone, and make calls hands-free calls.Rear view camera input: Once you put the car into reverse gear, the car radio screen will automatically display the reverse imageFM car radio presets 18 stations (frequency: 87.5-108 MHz), listening to the news, radio, music, etc.Support 4 playback modes: through 4 different audio input modes, including U disk/AUX/Bluetooth/TF card.Dual USB port: one USB port can connect your mobile phone and U disk, and the other USB port provides 2A fast charging, so you don’t have to worry about your phone running out of power anymore.Output power: 60W*4Working voltage: 12-14.4VDisplay resolution: 1024*6002-way audio output, audio formats: MP3/WMA/AAC/APE/OGG/M4A/RA/WAVVideo format: H263/H264/H265/DIVX HD(720P 1080I 1080P)AVI/FLV/MKV/RMVB/MPEG/WMV9/VC/ASF/TS/QTPicture format: JPEG/PNG/BMP/GIF/TIFFMulti-language: English/Chinese/French/German/Italian/Japanese/Portuguese/Russian/Spanish

Rear View Camera Car stereo is equipped with 12 high-definition rear night vision cameras, 170° ultra-wide viewing angle, fully waterproof design, making parking safer and easier. Simply back up and the system automatically activates the camera for optimal visibility no matter the weather!

Car Stereo with Bluetooth 5.1 Hands-free Call Car audio supports Bluetooth wireless audio streaming, which can be stably connected to your smartphone to realize hands-free calling and solve your calling problems while driving. At the same time, you can listen to your favorite music in the car audio.

Mirror Link Apple&Android Double din car radio supports the mirror link function of Apple and Android mobile phones. Connect the mobile phone through a data cable, just turn on the navigation function on the mobile phone, and then use the rearview mirror link to use the navigation function in the car. Note: Connect the mobile phone through mirroring to obtain GPS navigation function. 10-Band EQ 10-segment EQ settings to meet your needs for different sound quality, enjoy excellent sound quality anytime, anywhere Dual USB There are 2 USB ports on the front of the car audio, one USB port can connect your mobile phone and U disk, and the other USB port provides 2A fast charging, so you don’t have to worry about your phone running out of power anymore.

FM car radio FM car radio frequency is 87.5~108MHZ, you can listen to FM radio on your device through multiple channels at any time Steering Wheel Control Support the steering wheel control function, it is more convenient to quickly switch the desired function through the steering wheel of the car. We also provide remote control. Multiple Media Interfaces Support U disk / AUX-IN / TF card playback.
7 Inch 1024*600 Double Din Car Radio HD Touch Screen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit 98 mitsubishi eclipse!!
reviews.reviewText: This double din unit fit our 1998 mitsubishi eclipse. Replaced a different unit because we find the volume know easier to use without having to look to find buttons while driving. Does everything it should do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought unit in May 2023. Just reached 9 mo mark. A month ago the touch screen started acting and then mostly stopped working. Yesterday the sound all of a sudden sounds like an aux plug is shorting out. Also the mic always sucked for calls. Warning! GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a really good radio for the money
reviews.reviewText: I have bought more expensive radios for my car they all were difficult to useThis one installed easily I now have a back up camera I can’t say enough about this radio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars güerita us GPS bueno
reviews.reviewText: El radio y la cámara de reversa está bien el GPS y las aplicaciones no me gustan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the most part...
reviews.reviewText: Brackets that came with it, the holes were too small to fit the screws in to screw into its mount, it isn't 100% a flush fit to my dash even when using "Amazon fit." It was easy to wire, they need/should pre cut the wires better, it sounds rather nice and it is loud especially when you equalize to your type of music. Good for the money for sure. Didn't do the reverse camera but seems easy, I don't want to do it right now is all. Left a gap as you can see in picture even when I used Amazon fit, I guess it's not to see if it will fit perfectly but to see if it will fit in the radio slot possibly. All in all don't trust Amazon fit 100% that's where I went wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really nice radio at a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This does not fit on a Nissan Xterra I had to cut the oem dash or shave a couple inches from each side and the back up cam doesn’t work and for some reason the mic I had doesn’t work people on the other side of the phone say they hear a beeping noise I mean I can hear them but they only hear a beep. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like the product for my Dad truck....he loves it
